overview: Ms. Kimberly Bridges has served as our Vice President of Sales since February 2008. From July 2006 to February 2008, she served as the Director of Sales for Cardiology & Endovascular within the Cordis division of Johnson & Johnson. Prior to Johnson & Johnson, Ms. Bridges spent two years as a Director of Sales at Guidant Corporation, and held sales management positions at a variety of medical device firms including EV3 and Microvena. Ms. Bridges received a B.S. in Management from Pepperdine University and is currently pursuing an Executive M.B.A. at the USC Marshall School of Business.
